name: perfyll
description: Perfyll, a lightweight JavaScript library, seamlessly integrates Real User Monitoring (RUM), Application Performance Monitoring (APM), Log Management, and Error Tracking with the efficiency of a cloud service. Elevate your application's performance effortlessly. Explore more at https://perfyll.com
author: Claudivan Filho

scripts.run:app: cd tests/e2e/$appDir/application && npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:$port
scripts.cy:run: kill-port $port && npm run run:app && cypress run --spec "tests/e2e/$appDir/specs/smoke.cy.ts" && kill-port $port
scripts.run:perf: kill-port 3000 && kill-port 3100 && kill-port 6000 && concurrently "cd tests/perf/fakeCloud && npm run dev" "cd tests/perf/express-server && npm run dev"
scripts.test:perf: npm run build-perf && npm run run:perf & wait-on http://localhost:4000 && jest --testPathPattern='./tests/perf/performance.test.ts' --detectOpenHandles
